Helen Walker

WotD21 - Space

Aug 16, 2015

I love this quote, and I've written about it before.

It's #PositivePostIts time. Today's word is #Space #Quote http://helenwalker.net/2015/08/16/wotd21-space/ #Strength #Freedom #Blog

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Aug 16, 2015 at 11:08am PDT

So much of who we are is our choices, what we do when we're angry, what we do when we're scared, what we do when we feel overwhelmed. 

After the moment has passed I sometimes wish I had done something different, especially when my resources are low and I don't feel like I have made the most helpful choice.

The question I ask myself and the question I ask others when they are struggling is did you do the best you could in the moment? And if the answer is "Yes, but..." then they or I can work out what response would be more satisfying in hindsight.

My money is on Wayne having a astronomy theme to the day's doodle...  But let's see!
